targets.query: SELECT "iops" FROM "autogen"."io" WHERE "bucket_name" = 'read' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "bucket_name" fill(none)
SELECT "iops" FROM "autogen"."io" WHERE "bucket_name" = 'read' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "bucket_name" fill(none)

SELECT distinct("iops") FROM "autogen"."io" WHERE "bucket_name" = /$bucket_name/ AND "dev_name" = 'POOL' AND ext_dev_name =~ /$ext_dev_name/ and  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "bucket_name" fill(none)

SELECT max("cpu_user") AS "User", max("cpu_system") AS "System", max("cpu_iowait") as "IOWait" FROM "autogen"."system" WHERE "cloud_id" =~ /^$cloud$/ AND "vpsa_id" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND "dev_ext_name" = 'system-stat' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("iops") as iops FROM "$retention"."io" WHERE "cloud_id" =~ /^$cloud$/ AND "vpsa_id" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND "dev_name" =~ /^$dev_name$/ AND "dev_server_name" =~ /^$server_name$/ AND "bucket_name" =~ /^$bucket_name$/ AND "dev_ext_name" =~ /^$dev_ext_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "bucket_name" fill(null)

SELECT sum("mbps") as mbps FROM "$retention"."io" WHERE "cloud_id" =~ /^$cloud$/ AND "vpsa_id" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND "dev_name" =~ /^$dev_name$/ AND "dev_server_name" =~ /^$server_name$/ AND "bucket_name" =~ /^$bucket_name$/ AND "dev_ext_name" =~ /^$dev_ext_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "bucket_name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_ms") as avg_latency FROM "$retention"."io" WHERE "cloud_id" =~ /^$cloud$/ AND "vpsa_id" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND "dev_name" =~ /^$dev_name$/ AND "dev_server_name" =~ /^$server_name$/ AND "bucket_name" =~ /^$bucket_name$/ AND "dev_ext_name" =~ /^$dev_ext_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "bucket_name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("max_latency_ms") as max_latency FROM "$retention"."io" WHERE "cloud_id" =~ /^$cloud$/ AND "vpsa_id" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND "dev_name" =~ /^$dev_name$/ AND "dev_server_name" =~ /^$server_name$/ AND "bucket_name" =~ /^$bucket_name$/ AND "dev_ext_name" =~ /^$dev_ext_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "bucket_name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("mbps")*1024/mean("iops") as io_size FROM "$retention"."io" WHERE "cloud_id" =~ /^$cloud$/ AND "vpsa_id" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND "dev_name" =~ /^$dev_name$/ AND "dev_server_name" =~ /^$server_name$/ AND "bucket_name" =~ /^$bucket_name$/ AND "dev_ext_name" =~ /^$dev_ext_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "bucket_name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("active_ios") as active_ios FROM "$retention"."io" WHERE "cloud_id" =~ /^$cloud$/ AND "vpsa_id" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND "dev_name" =~ /^$dev_name$/ AND "dev_server_name" =~ /^$server_name$/ AND "bucket_name" =~ /^$bucket_name$/ AND "dev_ext_name" =~ /^$dev_ext_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "bucket_name" fill(null)

list.label: Cloud
list.name: cloud
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES from io WITH key= "cloud_id"

list.label: VPSA
list.name: vpsa
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES from io WITH key= "vpsa_id" where cloud_id =~ /$cloud/

list.label: Device Type
list.name: dev_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES from io WITH key= "dev_name" where cloud_id =~ /$cloud/ and vpsa_id =~ /$vpsa/

list.label: Server Name
list.name: server_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES from io WITH KEY = "dev_server_name" where  cloud_id=~ /$cloud/ and vpsa_id =~ /$vpsa/ and dev_name =~ /$dev_name/

list.label: IO Type
list.name: bucket_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES from io WITH key= "bucket_name" where cloud_id =~ /$cloud/  and vpsa_id =~ /$vpsa/ and dev_name =~ /$dev_name/

list.label: Device
list.name: dev_ext_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES from io WITH KEY = "dev_ext_name" where cloud_id=~ /$cloud/ and vpsa_id =~ /$vpsa/ and dev_name =~ /$dev_name/ and bucket_name =~ /$bucket_name/
